# File lib/external_archive.rb, line 744
  def reverse_each_str(&block) # :yield: string
    io_index.reverse_each do |(start,length)|
      next if start == nil

      # A more optimized approach would
      # read in a chunk of entries and
      # iterate over them?
      io.pos = start
      
      # yield entry string
      yield io.read(length)
    end
    self
  end
